channel.title: Dragon tattoo
channel.description:
Hello guys
I'm back with an another drawing. I've created a tattoo for my dad.
sketch: [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/netems.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/wtwsoi.jpg[/img] End result: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ua25x.png[/img]

item.title: Dragon tattoo
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

[quote=“voetbal645, post:11, topic:549111”][quote author=stCky link=topic=668020.msg4469896#msg4469896 date=1422393570]
I think it’s rad he went with purple for the dragon, totally wouldn’t have guessed that. Why did you end up not including the scales in the tattoo?

Cool idea your dad being the defender, wonder if my dad will get a tattoo of him protecting my 4 eyed goat lolol
[/quote]
It’s not purple, it’s red but with the flash of my camera it turns purple. Tomorrow I will post the end result.[/quote]

Oh wow, then it’d be cool if it was purple

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon tattoo
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

[quote=“stCky, post:10, topic:549111”]I think it’s rad he went with purple for the dragon, totally wouldn’t have guessed that. Why did you end up not including the scales in the tattoo?

Cool idea your dad being the defender, wonder if my dad will get a tattoo of him protecting my 4 eyed goat lolol[/quote]
It’s not purple, it’s red but with the flash of my camera it turns purple. Tomorrow I will post the end result.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon tattoo
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Loos amazing though in the actual tattoo I think it should have looked better if the red eyes weren’t there.
It makes it look less impressive than on the drawing.

item.title: Dragon tattoo
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Soulcist:

Probably the best drawing than I would ever be able to do in the years to come in my life. Anyway, not something I would have a tattoo but nice job nonetheless.

Thanks mate but the tattoo has a meaning.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon tattoo
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:549111”]Awesome drawing, just not something I personally would get as a tattoo.
I’d assume the cross has some meaning here instead of just looking pretty, or am I wrong?[/quote]
It is a meaning, I have the same cross on my forearm. So my dad is the defender.[quote=“Vain_, post:3, topic:549111”]the dragon is really thin then really thick…?[/quote]
A dragon doesn’t need to be always thick, right?

Read full topic
